comment: great teacher! tough grader when it comes to showing work on tests, but gives you everything you need to do great in the class!

Awesome teacher. Wish she taught more math classes because I would gladly take her again.  Made class interesting with her bubbly and enthusiastic personality.  HW was straight forward and easy after her lectures.  Tests aren't bad at all and she gives you most of the formulas.  Also from time to time she'll let class out early for campus events.

She moves way to fast. She doesn't give you extra help and expects you to understand it the first . If you don't understand , she just moves on . Her only suggestion is to practice on mymathlab . Worst thing ever . . Her tests counts for 93% of your grade while homework is only 7% . Ridiculous . Run away !

Didn't like her that much at the beginning of the semester bc she is arrogant and teaching style seemed even middle schoolish for me but u get used to it. Give lots of examples and tells u exactly what's on the test, 3 or 4 sections of homework on mymathlab  for each chp but isn't too long or difficult. Tests are easy if u just go to class

Ms. Tammy I told you I would review and here it goes! Ms. Tammy as a person is really sweet and upbeat. As a teacher she can get annoyed at times and demands respect. She is very helpful when you ask for it. She even helps during tests which was AMAZING of her! I struggled at the beginning but the end was okay. GOOD LUCK TO YOU IN FLORIDA MS. TAMMY

Yes her tests are very short, but she literally tells what each question is and what to study days before the test. She provides you with alot of examples to make sure you understand it and is the only algebra teacher on campus to teach the "R" chapter. If you take her you'll understand how much of a life saver she is. I would take her again!
Loved her! super good at explain math problems, very patient.

A-W-E-S-O-M-E and witty. She is so fun and hands on! She makes math so simple and wants you to understand! I was never strong in math and she proved me wrong. SHE does come off as very hard the first day, but stick around and you will enjoy it and get an awesome grade! Just do HW and practice!

I am not that good at math, but Professor Howlette is really clear when giving notes. There is a lot of homework, but it really does help you come test day. The tests are kind of trickier given there aren't that many questions, but do the online review and you should be good to go.
She is a great teacher! Highly recommend her I would take more of my math classes with her if she taught them.
Professor Howlette is an amazing teacher. She is very clear in her lectures and helps you with whatever questions or problems you have. Definitely take her, you will not regret it.

SHE IS AN AMAZING MATH PROFESSOR ! I am the worst at Math, all the math courses I took before, both at the high school and college level I did not make higher than a C. However in Mrs. Howlette's class I made an A and I owe it all to her. She really takes her time to explain the material and mymathlab really does help improve your skill.

Best math teacher I have ever had. She takes the time out to make sure you understand before you move on. I am not very good at math, but still came out with a B. I took her summer semester which is a lot faster than fall/spring. Highly recommend her if you aren't the best at math. If you are good at math then its an easy A. Just Study!!!

Where do I start? Her tests are literally 12 questions so if you miss one you fail. Everything is on mymathlab she puts the easy questions on there and hard questions on the test. She gives 6 tests and a final she. I would recommend her if your good at math she moves very fast. I fail 4 out of 6 tests but still managed to pass with a B.

She's very good at explaining things in class, and I understood all the material, but her tests have barely any questions, so if you get even ONE question wrong, you could lose up to 15 points. STUDY for the tests on mymathlab, even if you study the day before the test only, you should pass. She does get moody quite a bit though.
She was very easy and very helpful. I think I made lower than an A once. She explains the material very well.

She is absolutely the sweetest person you will meet at KSU as far as professors go.  Her teaching style is a little high school-ish but they definitely aid you in learning the material (especially Ch 4).  She's always on time and teaches "bell to bell".  Attendance is mandatory and so is homework.  NO BUSY WORK. high recommend taking her for 1101.

Miss Tammy is so nice! I am not good at math and I can honestly say she has helped me build my confidence. If you come to class, pay attention, and do all of your homework, you will be great. Almost everyone has a A or B. She always tries hard to make sure everyone understands. Shell come to class before or stay after with you to explain. TAKE HER!

Best math teacher at KSU! She is truly awesome, She's patient, punctual, and easy to understand. Don't buy the textbook, she only uses it to teach. She loves to make sure everyone understands. There's homework almost every night and quizzes are open note. Bottom line, you won't regret taking her class so by all means TAKE HER!!!

Ms. Tammy is a great teacher overall. She explains things well. And she make sure everyone gets a understanding. She sometimes has mood swings one week she all happy and the next week she will be very smart mouth and arrogant. Besides her being arrogant she is a great teacher you can't take that from her.

I cannot express how pleased I am with this professor... not only does she teach the material effectively, but she thoroughly engages the class. I'm also pleased to say that I've retained everything! Take this class if you get the chance!!

I really did enjoy having her as a professor. She made everyone feel smart and took the time to make sure we understood what was going on. She never use a text book and all the homework and quizzes were on mymathlab.com. I hope you enjoy having her just as much as I did.

Tammy is super sweet and I liked her class. It was very easy to me and she's always willing to explain anything multiple times. She breaks everything down and makes sure everyone understands it. She's young so she's really easy to connect with. Definitely take her course! I haven't gotten anything lower than a 98 in her class.

Good teacher overall. She is young and strays off-topic sometimes but demands your respect. GO TO CLASS OR YOU WILL MISS A LOT. Quizzes are online, easy homework almost every night (buy the MyMathLab online code, book not needed). She previously taught high school so she knows how to dumb the math down so everyone can understand it.

I really enjoyed this class! I had her over the summer and got a B in the class. As long as you attend class and do the online homework you'll be good! I'm not sure how classes differ between the summer and during the year aside from everything is quicker. I'd recommend her (:

I had Tammy as my College Algebra teacher. She did a great job! I am horrible at Math. She broke it all down so I could understand the material. I am now in Calculus and I feel that I am adequately prepared. I would definitely recommend her. If you are diligent and willing to do the work you will be rewarded with a good grade in this class.
I've had her as my Algebra II teacher in 11th Grade. She's an amazing teacher to have. I really hope to have her in the future.
Young, so she tries to be everyones best friend and gets off topic easily but easiest math class ever. Just take notes, go to class (it is mandatory) and do the hw and you will pass with a easy 100.

The class is very easy (especially if you attended gwinnett county schools) and no textbook is needed. All you need is mymathlab. Attendance is mandatory but I missed a few classes and still managed a B. She is a very nice teacher and explains the content very well for those he need help.

Great teacher! Attendance is mandatory and she usually takes role. Buying the book is pointless--just make sure you get the MyMathLab code. She's funny but get on her good side! She knows what she's doing. Some quizzes are in-class and some are online. The ones in-class can be difficult but I never made below a high A on a test-SUPER EASY A!!!

Overall, I did not enjoy this teacher. I feel that if I had not had a background in algebra I would have been totally lost. She is very moody and wants to win the hearts of all of her students. I would not recommend her. She tries too hard to get people to like her and when it seems like they don't she retaliates by being rude and winy.

I finally understood math because of this teacher. For the first time I get As! I recommend her. She is young and fun and so helpful. She explains every thing so clearly and I always felt prepared for examinations. I recommend her. GREAT TEACHER

amazing teacher! shes so funny and acts just like a college student. she is very helpful and clear on what she expects from you. she always jokes around, just dont talk while shes teaching. she'll freak out, but go right back to laughing and joking. even though shes pretty funny, shes also serious in math and is a great teacher. i recommend her!!!

She is a great teacher! All your information for the class comes straight from her notes or mymathlab. Don't bother buying the textbook because you won't need it at all. Her notes go everything perfectly and all the homework is on that website. TAKE HER IF YOU GET THE CHANCE! :]

She's a fantastic teacher & goes through everything step by step. She gives very detailed notes & is very helpful. She's a great teacher and i highly recommend her. She also seems like she is trying to be your friend instead of an intimidating instructor. She always has the class laughing & makes sure that all her students understand the material.

Very clear and helpful. She understands that sometimes students have lives outside of school and tries to simplify things as a result, with great success. She is very flexible and can often be quite funny.
Great teacher, goes to every length to make sure her students understand the material.  She genuinely cares that they do well.
